name: The Alien Invasion
description:
The year is 2057, almost 2 years after the aliens arrived, trying to take over the Universe. You and your team work for the government, trying to take down these creatures.

This is a 16-Bit style Platform Shooter made for DkUniverse's 4th Game Jam, I was the winner in the 1st and now I'm back! 

This Demo made for the Jam has the first level, but don't make that think this will be easy, I made sure the difficulty matches the older era of games.
